mapper.select: SELECT /* InspectionListManageMapper.selectChklstNmByChklstId 유재원 */ c.CHKLST_NM AS chklstNm , m.CHKLST_NM AS masterChklstNm FROM CHKLST c LEFT JOIN CHKLST m ON c.MASTER_CHKLST_ID = m.CHKLST_ID WHERE c.CHKLST_STTS_W = '1' AND c.CHKLST_ID = #{chklstId}

SELECT /* InspectionListManageMapper.selectCtgByChklstId 유재원 */ CC.CTG_ID AS ctgId , CC.CTG_NM AS ctgNm , CC.STND_SCORE AS stndScore , CC.CTG_USE_W AS ctgUseW , CC.SEQ AS seq FROM CHKLST C , CHKLST_CTG CC WHERE C.CHKLST_ID = CC.CHKLST_ID AND MASTER_CTG_ID IS NULL AND C.CHKLST_ID = #{chklstId} ORDER BY CC.SEQ

SELECT /* InspectionListManageMapper.selectSubCtgByChklstIdAndCtgNm 유재원 */ cc2.CTG_ID AS CTG_ID , cc2.CTG_NM AS CTG_NM , cc2.CTG_USE_W AS CTG_USE_W , cc2.SEQ AS SEQ FROM CHKLST c , CHKLST_CTG cc , CHKLST_CTG cc2 WHERE c.CHKLST_ID = cc.CHKLST_ID AND cc.CTG_ID = cc2.MASTER_CTG_ID AND cc2.MASTER_CTG_ID IS NOT NULL AND c.CHKLST_ID = #{chklstId} AND cc.CTG_NM = #{ctgNm} ORDER BY cc2.SEQ

/* InspectionListManageMapper.selectEvitByCtgNmAndCtgId 유재원 */ SELECT ce.EVIT_ID, ce.EVIT_CONTENT AS evitNm, (SELECT dtl_cd_nm FROM COMM_CD_DTL ccd WHERE dtl_cd = EVIT_TYPE_CD) AS EVIT_TYPE_NM, ce.SCORE, ce.CHKLST_EVIT_USE_W, ce.EVIT_SEQ AS seq FROM CHKLST_CTG cc JOIN CHKLST_EVIT ce ON cc.CTG_ID = ce.CTG_ID JOIN CHKLST_CTG cc2 ON cc.MASTER_CTG_ID = cc2.CTG_ID WHERE cc.MASTER_CTG_ID IS NOT NULL AND cc.CTG_NM = #{ctgNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cc2.CTG_ID = #{ctgId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT /* InspectionListManageMapper.selectEvitChclstByCtgIdAndEvitNm 유재원 */ ec.CHCLST_ID , ec.CHCLST_CONTENT , ec.NPRFS_CD , ec.PRF_W , ec.SCORE , ec.PENALTY , ec.BSN_SSPN_DAYNUM , ec.EVIT_CHCLST_USE_W , ec.CHCLST_SEQ FROM CHKLST_CTG cc , CHKLST_EVIT ce , EVIT_CHCLST ec WHERE cc.MASTER_CTG_ID IS NOT NULL AND cc.CTG_ID = ce.CTG_ID AND cc.CTG_ID = #{ctgId} AND ce.EVIT_ID = ec.EVIT_ID AND ce.EVIT_CONTENT = #{evitNm}
